comment._content:
Just came across this by accident (was looking for my own photos on Flickr).  Harvey D. Higley was my great uncle, brother of my paternal grandfather and son of Elmer A. Higley from Cedar Rapids, Iowa.  From what I recall from family conversation, he rose to Brigadier General and was offered a post as commander of West Point, but declined for health reasons.  Died in 1963 in Carmel, CA, buried at Arlington.  If anyone should want more information, I'd be happy to provide it.
David Page Higley
